channel.title: *Ultimate* List Of What You Computer Should Have
channel.description:
Ok, well maybe not the ultimate ;).
Your computer isn't complete without the following:
[b][u]Free Software[/u][/b] * = Highly Recommended.
* ImgBurn - [url=http://www.imgburn.com/index.php?act=download]Download Here[/url] Description - Burns image files very easily without the hassle of trying to use Nero or some other huge and space consuming program. This program has been created by the same developer of DVD Decrypter, but unlike that program, this is legal!
* DVDFab Decrypter - [url=http://www.dvdfab.com/free.htm]Download Here[/url] Description - Decrypt many different kinds of DVDs. This is the successor to DVD Decrypter so get it while you can!
* Ad-Aware SE Personal - [url=http://www.lavasoft.de/products/ad-aware_se_personal.php]Download Here[/url] Description - A very good Adware/Spyware remover. Just make sure to do a Full Scan!
Spybot - Search & Destroy - [url=http://www.safer-networking.org/en/download/index.html]Download Here[/url] Description - Remove Spyware & Adware Guaranteed. It's quick & easy. Remember to update before scanning every time!
* CCleaner - [url=http://www.ccleaner.com/download/]Download Here[/url] Description - A simple program that removes unused temporary files and unused registry entries from Windows machines.
* GAIM/Pidgin - [url=http://www.pidgin.im]Download Here[/url] Description - Light weight instant message client that supports every chat - AIM, Bonjour, Gadu-Gadu, Google Talk, Groupwise, ICQ, IRC, MSN, QQ, SILC, SIMPLE, Sametime, XMPP, Yahoo!, and Zephyr.
Miranda-IM - [url=http://www.miranda-im.org/]Download Here[/url] Description - Instant message client that supports every chat, unlike GAIM/Pidgin this has a different style.
Trillian - [url=http://www.trillian.cc/]Download Here[/url] Description - Heavy weight instant messaging client.
AOL Instant Messenger - AIM - [url=http://info.aol.co.uk/aim/]Download Here[/url] Description - Instant messaging client for only the protocol AIM.
Windows Live Messenger - MSN - [url=http://get.live.com/messenger/features]Download Here[/url] Description - Instant messaging client for only the protocol MSN....But better ;)
IRC - [url=http://www.mirc.com/get.html]Download Here[/url] Description - Internet Relay Chat. Join channels and talk with others using the protocol IRC.
* uTorrent/µTorrent - [url=http://www.utorrent.com/download.php]Download Here[/url] Description - µTorrent is a lightweight and efficient BitTorrent client for Windows with many features.
Azureus - [url=http://azureus.sourceforge.net/download.php]Download Here[/url] Description - BitTorrent client.
BitComet - [url=http://www.bitcomet.com/]Download Here[/url] Description - Multilanguage and multitracker BitTorrent client. Developed in C++.
* Mozilla Firefox - [url=http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/]Download Here[/url] Description - Internet web browser with high security, many options, and constantly improving. This supports plugins in case it does not contain a feature you want. Way better and much more secure than Internet Explorer 7 (IE7)! This supports plugins in case it does not contain a feature you want.
Opera - [url=http://www.opera.com/]Download Here[/url] Description - Internet web browser.
* Mozilla Thunderbird - [url=http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/thunderbird/]Download Here[/url] Description - Very well made Email Client and it's much better than Microsoft's Outlook Express in terms of security and functionality. This supports plugins in case it does not contain a feature you want.
WinAMP - [url=http://www.winamp.com/]Download Here[/url] Description - Winamp is a multimedia player that is skinnable and supports multi-format
LimeWire - [url=http://www.limewire.com/]Download Here[/url] Description - LimeWire is a free file sharing Gnutella client for Windows, Mac, OSX, Linux. You can search, download, and share all files.
iTunes - [url=http://www.apple.com/itunes/download/]Download Here[/url] Description - Audio player with multiple playlist functions, native burn support, visual effects, and file conversion.
* 7-ZIP - [url=http://www.7-zip.org/]Download Here[/url] Description - Has support for many different file compression formats and, so far, has the best compression software!
WinRAR - [url=http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm]Download Here[/url] Description - WinRAR provides the full RAR and ZIP file support, can decompress CAB, GZIP, ACE and other archive formats.
HyperSnap - [url=http://www.hyperionics.com/]Download Here[/url] Description - HyperSnap 6 is the fastest and easiest way to take screen captures from Windows screen and text capture from places where system text copy is not possible.
* Open Office - [url=http://www.openoffice.org]Download Here[/url] Description - Open Source alternative to Microsoft Office. This includes programs like Word, Excel, Powerpoint, and more.
AbiWord - [url=http://www.abiword.com]Download Here[/url] Description - An easy to use word processor.
* GIMP - [url=http://www.gimp.org/downloads/]Download Here[/url] Description - Software designed to be an alternative to Adobe Photoshop and has many of it's features.
Blender 3D - [url=http://www.blender.org]Download Here[/url] Description - Create beautiful animations using this fully functional, graphic, light weight, open source software.
Google Earth - [url=http://earth.google.com/]Download Here[/url] Description - Offers maps and satellite images for complex or pinpointed regional searches.
Skype - [url=http://www.skype.com/download/]Download Here[/url] Description - Skype is a little program for making free calls over the internet to anyone else who ... You can call anyone else on Skype, anywhere in the world for free.
Terragen - [url=http://www.planetside.co.uk/terragen/]Download Here[/url] Description - Landscape generator with controllable parameters that allow extremely varied terrain shapes and photo realistic rendering.
SwiftSwitch - [url=http://www.swiftswitch.net/]Download Here[/url] Description - A RuneScape, legal program, with a world switcher, quick access to calculators, and many tools!
* Foxit PDF Software - [url=http://www.foxitsoftware.com/]Download Here[/url] Description - Foxit's PDF Software includes a PDF reader, PDF creater, PDF editor, and PDF IFilter.
nLite - [url=http://www.nliteos.com]Download Here[/url] Description - Let's you strip down your Windows [u]XP[/u] installation CD in order to remove frivolous software and boost your overall experience and speed.
vLite - [url=http://www.vlite.net]Download Here[/url] Description - Let's you strip down your Windows [u]Vista[/u] installation CD in order to remove frivolous software and boost your overall experience and speed.
* TCP Optimizer - [url=http://www.speedguide.net/downloads.php]Download Here[/url] Description - Increases your download and upload speed.
* Comodo Firewall - [url=http://www.personalfirewall.comodo.com/]Download Here[/url] Description - A free firewall with high security that keeps hackers out and personal information in.
AutoPatcher XP - [url=http://www.softpedia.com/get/Tweak/System-Tweak/AutoPatcher-XP.shtml]Download Here[/url] Description - Enables you to install Windows Updates without having to have your Windows installation verified or even touched by Microsoft. Very useful when doing offline updates or if you have a strange version of Windows.
Notepad ++ - [url=http://notepad-plus.sourceforge.net/uk/site.htm]Download Here[/url] Description - This is a great and small program to write any kind of code in. Java, CSS, C, C#, C+, C++, HTML, PHP, Python, ASP, Perl, and many many other different types of code.
[b][u]If you feel I have missed something out, let me know ;)[/u][/b]
[u][b]Pay To Use (There Are Cracks For All Of These!)[/b][/u]
AVG Anti Virus - [url=http://www.grisoft.com/doc/5/lng/us/tpl/tpl01]Homepage[/url] Description - The complex anti-virus protection for your computer. Download - Unable to find a clean download yet.
Camtasia Studio - [url=http://www.softwarecasa.com/pprod/212402dd.htm?gclid=CNbersG4g4gCFT55MAodRBTSHg]Homepage[/url] Description - Record & Create Full Motion Screen Video Tutorial & Presentation Today
Adobe Photoshop - [url=http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/]Homepage[/url] Description - Adobe Photoshop CS2 software, the professional image-editing standard and leader of the Photoshop digital imaging line, delivers more of what you crave. Download - [url=http://files.filefront.com//;5949401;;/]Here[/url]
3D Studio Max - [url=http://usa.autodesk.com/adsk/servlet/index?id=5659302&siteID=123112]Homepage[/url] Description - Highly customizable and scalable 3D animation, modeling, and rendering program. Download - [url=http://torrentspy.com/torrent/434530/AUTODESK_3D_STUDIO_MAX_v8_0]Here[/url]
LimeWire PRO - [url=http://www.limewire.com/english/content/home.shtml]Homepage[/url] Description - LimeWire offers an advanced peer-to-peer client software package compatible with the Gnutella file-sharing protocol. Download - [url=http://www.info.com.ph/~cyberray/LimeWireWin.zip]Here[/url] Or download [url=http://sales.limewire.com/060625/Jm2BSc ... Qytn7RN7z/]Here[/url]
WinRAR - [url=http://www.rarlab.com/shop2rarlab.php?prod=winrar]Homepage[/url] Description - WinRAR provides the full RAR and ZIP file support, can decompress CAB, GZIP, ACE and other archive formats. Download - [url=http://www.uploading.com/?get=5WXG1630]Here[/url]
Macromedia/Adobe Dreamweaver - [url=http://www.adobe.com/products/]Homepage[/url] Description - The complete design environment now features the all-new Adobe Acrobat 8 Professional plus Dreamweaver 8.
Macromedia/Adobe Flash - [url=http://www.adobe.com/products/]Homepage[/url] Description - Adobe Flash Player is the standard for delivering high-impact, rich Web content.
Adobe Acrobat Reader - [url=http://www.adobe.com/products/]Homepage[/url] Description - Adobe Reader provides a host of features that enable you to submit PDF forms created with fillable form fields to such applications as Adobe Acrobat 7.0 Download - [url=http://torrentspy.com/torrent/830532/Adobe_Acrobat_7_Pro_with_Keygen_SquiggiE]Here[/url]
Microsoft AutoRoute - [url=http://www.microsoft.com/uk/homepc/autoroute/ProductDetails.aspx?pid=002]Homepage[/url] Description - Microsoft AutoRoute 2006 is the customizable trip planning software that helps you get accurate directions, easily explore new areas and find the services you need. No Download or crack found..yet.
* System Mechanic - [url=http://download.tko.iolo.net/sm/6pro/trial/SystemMechanic6Pro.exe]Download Here[/url] Description - Has many tools to keep your computer efficient and clean. Make sure to put in this as your User ID: Team AGGRESSiON
[b][u]REMEMBER - CRACKS ARE AVAILABLE FOR ALL/MOST OF THE PROGRAMS ABOVE! BEST WAY TO GET THEM IS TO DOWNLOAD TORRENTS!
If you feel I have missed any program out, please let me know :)[/u][/b]
Hope you found some new stuff in that list, enjoy!
Edit: Updated a lot by Ron.

item.title: *Ultimate* List Of What You Computer Should Have

item.description:
@A_Legend wrote:

I agree with the Spybot…I’m always using it, Same with Firefox a great list there Chris, Thanks.

item.title: *Ultimate* List Of What You Computer Should Have
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Incredimail isn’t all that used, but it is a pretty cool E-mail program. You can add backgrounds, signatures, smilies, notifications, etc. You can do this with other E-mail sites, but this is actually a pretty decent program. Download: http://www.incredimail.com/english/splash.aspx

Read full topic
item.source: *Ultimate* List Of What You Computer Should Have

item.title: *Ultimate* List Of What You Computer Should Have
item.dc:creator: @Yeh Yeh
item.description:
@Yeh wrote:

Great list! I think DVD Shrink is also very useful. I especiallt love it’s re-authoring feature. And probably some kind of console-imitating program for Win would be handy, I hate it’s command line. Also VLC. And Amarok if one uses Linux. But this is all matter of opinion of course.

Read full topic

item.title: *Ultimate* List Of What You Computer Should Have
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

You tagged mIRC as “IRC.” mIRC is not the only IRC client.
You put on 5 overlapping IM clients and 5 p2p programs.

Some other points I CBF’d making at 3 AM.

You don’t need most of these apps on a computer.
